subtitle: [Music]
as a born and bred new yorker
one of the hallmark elements of a city
like new york
is noise rush hour
movement some people are addicted to it
they love it
the action you go to the country
if you're a new yorker you're actually
surprised
by the quietude by the serenity by the
silence
but since the pandemic broke i can tell
you new york has been silenced
relatively speaking it's not quite as
noisy
and it made me think about the power of
silence
it elicited a very powerful statement
in the zohar in the classic work of
jewish mysticism
the question is asked what is greater
the service through song voice
sound or the service through silence
you see the priests in the time of the
temple
the holy temple would serve in utter
silence
the levites were composers they served
through song
so ostensibly intuitively most of us
would say
sound is louder than silence music
song is more moving than
quiet the truth is no that's not the
case
though song has its power and we know
what it can do to us
transport us to another time and place
but silence reaches a deeper place in
the soul
it's so deep you can't even you can't
even express it in any sound
you ever wonder when people talk about
things
when it comes to superficial things we
can talk about it forever
when it talks about when you have to
talk about more internal things more
intimate
you don't have that many words so we
create the language of metaphor
poetry which can
expand the container so we can express
more
but then there are things that even
metaphor is not enough and it's
sometimes just a word
a cry oy vey a cry of joy
and sometimes that too is not adequate
it's utter silence in the negative it
can be total shock
and the positive there are no words to
express what i'm feeling now
so silence has great power the sound of
silence
and a time like this when so much of
our daily schedules and routines have
been quieted
silenced the volume has gone down it's
an opportunity to reach and hear a voice
that's beyond sound a voice that comes
from the depths
of our heart and soul try it out take a
few moments each day
and shut off all the external sounds all
the turbulence
and you'll hear a voice that you usually
don't hear because it's drowned out
by all those powerful noises and sounds
in our lives
